property.name: Text
property.value: If you have a Melee character on the battlefield -> Look at the top card of your deck. You may scrap it. If you have a Ranged character on the battlefield -> Do 1 damage to an enemy. If you have a Specialist on the battlefield -> Draw a card. Then scrap a card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. When it attacks this turn in Tank mode -> It gets +2 ATK until end of battle and you scrap all the defender's Armors.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> Draw a card. While this is on Chromia, Nautica, Novastar, or Windblade -> She has Focus 1.

property.name: Type
property.value: Secret Action

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your Planes, Helicopters, or Spaceships defends. When Revealed -> Flip that character to bot mode. It gets +1 DEF until the end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap up to 3 cards from your hand. Draw a card for each card scrapped this way. If you began the game with only Autobots -> Plan 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Constructicons gets +2 until end of turn. Put a height counter on your Tower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your Decepticons. It gets +2 until end of turn. Choose an enemy Autobot. It gets -2 DEF until end of turn.

property.name: Type
property.value: Secret Action

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When Revealed -> Each [B] your opponent flips this battle is a [W] instead.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Megatron only. Pierce 2.

property.name: Type
property.value: Secret Action

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your Planes, Helicopters or Spaceships would take attack damage. When Revealed -> Instead that character takes that much attack damage minus 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Melee characters gets +2 ATK until end of turn. Repair 1 damage from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if your starting team was all Constructicons. Return a Builder's Tools, Constructicon Enigma, Heavy Landing, or Reclaim from your scrap pile to your hand. If your Tower is 6 or higher, you may play that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put an enemy Upgrade on the bottom of its owner's deck. That player draws a card.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Melee characters only. Bold 1. When the upgraded character becomes tapped -> Do 1 damage to a tapped enemy.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: The upgraded character has the Motorcycle trait. When the upgraded character defends against an enemy that has more Stars than it -> The upgraded characters gets +1 DEF.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Cars gets +1 ATK until end of turn. If this is the third Revving the Engine you have played this turn -> One of your characters can attack untapped characters this turn as thought they were tapped. You may play another Revving the Engine.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: This can be in a Weapon or Utility slot.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: While the upgraded character is attacking a Melee character -> The upgraded character has +2 ATK.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Constructicons gets Bold 2 until end of turn. If you have Devestator, Towering Warrior on the battlefield -> Tap an enemy character that has 14 Stars or fewer.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> Plan 2. When you put a card from your hand on top of your deck -> The upgraded character gets Pierce 1 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Warpath, Confident Sharpshooter defends in alt mode -> Reduce the attacker's Pierce total by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Private Sideswipe, Infantry Soldier has Stealth and +2 HP

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Skytread (Plane), Special Ops Soldier has +1 DEF. When you combine into Raider Skytread, Special Ops Soldier -> For each card placed under him you may repair 1 damage from him up to a maximum of 5 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Captain Astrotrain, Spaceforce Transport flips to another mode -> Scrap the top card of your deck, if it is an Upgrade you may play it on him. Your Captain Astrotrain, Spaceforce Transport gets +1 HP for each Upgrade he has equipped up to a maximum of +3 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Before the game begins -> You may reveal a Holomatter Projector from your deck and put it into your hand. When you play a Holomatter Project and you have Sergeant Hound, Infantry Recon on the battlefield -> Draw 2 cards and then scrap a card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: If an opponent's card would cause an Armor to be scrapped from your Major Ultra Magnus, Infantry City Commander -> Instead, you may scrap an Armor from your hand. While your Major Ultra Magnus, Infantry City Commander is upgraded with Ultra Magnus Armor -> He has +2 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: If your starting team is all Constructions -> Your Constructicons have +2 HP. At the start of your first turn -> Remove a height counter from your Tower. When you flip a Constructicon to bot mode -> Draw a card. When you combine into Devestator, Towering Warrior -> Flip this.

property.name: Type
property.value: Stratagem - back

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Devestator, Towering Warrior has +2 HP and Tough equal to his Bold total.

property.name: Text
property.value: Before the game begins -> You may put a Smokethrower from your deck on your Private Smokescreen, Special Ops Soldier. While your Private Smokescreen, Special Ops Soldier is upgraded with Smokethrower -> Your other characters have Safeguard 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: If your starting team is all Insecticons -> Your starting Star limit is increased by 2.

card.name: Out of the Way Hot Rod!

property.name: Text
property.value: If your Private Hot Rod, Infantry Soldier would take non-attack damage -> Instead you may have one of your other characters take that non-attack damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: If your starting team is all Omnibots -> Your starting Star limit is increased by 1. Each of your Omnibots has +1 HP and +1 DEF. When you upgrade one of your Omnibot Cars -> Draw a card. Then scrap a card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Before the game begins -> You may put a Cybertronium Bow from your deck on your Specialist Flamewar, Special Ops Hunter. When your Specialist Flamewar, Special Ops Hunter is upgraded with Cybertronium Bow and attacks -> Do 2 damage to the defender after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a Secret Action while you have Soundwave, Communications on the battlefield -> Do 1 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Acid Storm, Toxic Terror is in alt mode -> He has Pierce 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn -> You may scrap a card from your hand. If you do, flip this. When your Nightbird, Tera-Kura Construct attacks and doesn't have a Weapon -> She gets +1 ATK until end of battle.

property.name: Type
property.value: Stratagem - back

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn -> You may scrap a card from your hand. If you do, flip this. When your Nightbird, Tera-Kura Construct defends and doesn't have an Armor -> She gets +1 DEF until end of battle.

property.name: Type
property.value: Character - Bot Mode

property.name: Text
property.value: Focus 1. When this battles a Melee enemy -> Do 1 damage to that enemy after the battle.
